casebody.data:
Robert J. TRIFFIN, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
FOREMOST PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Michael Graf a/k/a Michael H. Graf t/a Service Master of the Shore and Citibank, N.A., Defendants. C-499 September Term 2017
080187 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 12, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002903-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
